content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'gold_bigpharma_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [gold_bigpharma_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://gold@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.f_planning_book (
	[product_id] int,
	[country_id] int,
	[financial_date] date,
	[forecast_snapshot] date,
	[quantity] bigint,
	[amount] float,
	[unit_price] float,
	[whrs_sell_in_quantity] bigint,
	[whrs_open_quantity] bigint,
	[whrs_end_quantity] bigint,
	[whrs_sell_in_amount] float,
	[whrs_open_amount] float,
	[whrs_end_amount] float,
	[pos_sell_out_quantity] bigint,
	[pos_open_quantity] bigint,
	[pos_end_quantity] bigint,
	[pos_sell_out_amount] float,
	[pos_open_amount] float,
	[pos_end_amount] float,
	[discount] float
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'f_planning_book/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [gold_bigpharma_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.f_planning_book
GO
